name: tag_date
description: Date and time that the resource group was created

name: tag_owner
description: Name of tag that contains the name of the person that created the resource group

name: tag_vm_start_stop_time
description: Start and stop times for a VM. This should be in the format '<HH:mm> - <HH:mm>'

name: tag_timezone
description: Timezone that the resource should be measured against

name: tag_days_of_week
description: Days of the week that a VM is permitted to run. 0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday etc

name: duration
description: Number of days that an RG is allowed to exist for

name: destroy
description: State if the reaper is in destructive mode or not

name: manage_vms
description: If enabled the Reaper will stop and start virtual machines according to the schedule.

name: vm_start
description: Time at which Virtual Machines are permitted to run from

name: vm_stop
description: Time at which Virtual Machines are permitted to run until

name: permitted_days
description: Days of week that a virtual machine is permitted to run

name: webhook_url
description: URL that is required to post messages to in Slack

name: icon_url
description: URL to icon used in Slack messages

name: notification_emails
description: List of email addresses that should recieve Slack notifications from the reaper

name: bot_username
description: Name of the bot when it sends messages to users in Slack

name: token
description: Token used to post messages to Slack

name: slack_enabled
description: State if Reaper is permitted to send Slack notifications

name: notify_delay
description: Delay between notifing owners of shutdown or deletion
